# coding: utf-8
import sys, os
sys.path.append('/home/vscode/.local/lib/python3.12/site-packages/runnb')
import tee
sys.stdin = tee.Tee(sys.__stdin__, sys.stdin)
sys.stdout = tee.Tee(sys.__stdout__, sys.stdout)
sys.stderr = tee.Tee(sys.__stderr__, sys.stderr)
del sys.modules['tee']
del tee
import click
import pandas as pd
import pyterrier as pt
from auto_ir_metadata import persist_ir_metadata
run = pd.DataFrame([
    {"qid": "q-1", "docno": "doc-01", "rank": 1, "score": 10},
    {"qid": "q-1", "docno": "doc-02", "rank": 2, "score": 9},
    {"qid": "q-1", "docno": "doc-03", "rank": 3, "score": 8},
])

output_directory = "."

pt.io.write_results(run, f"{output_directory}/run.txt", format="trec")
persist_ir_metadata(output_directory, system_name='my-system', system_description='my-description')
